allow: Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:3001/api/characters" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""name"":""测试角色"",""description"":""这是一个测试角色"",""personality_data"":{""energy"":50,""friendliness"":70,""humor"":60,""professionalism"":80,""creativity"":65,""empathy"":75},""story_background"":""测试背景故事"",""examples"":[{""input"":""你好"",""output"":""你好，很高兴认识你！""}]}")

Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/characters" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""name"":""测试角色"",""description"":""这是一个测试角色"",""personality_data"":{""energy"":50,""friendliness"":70,""humor"":60,""professionalism"":80,""creativity"":65,""empathy"":75},""story_background"":""测试背景故事"",""examples"":[{""input"":""你好"",""output"":""你好，很高兴认识你！""}]}" -v)

Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/characters" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""name"":""测试角色"",""description"":""这是一个测试角色"",""personality_data"":{""energy"":50,""friendliness"":70,""humor"":60,""professionalism"":80,""creativity"":65,""empathy"":75},""story_background"":""测试背景故事"",""examples"":[{""input"":""你好"",""output"":""你好，很高兴认识你！""}]}")

Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:3001/api/characters" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""name"":""前端测试角色"",""description"":""通过前端创建的测试角色"",""personality_data"":{""energy"":80,""friendliness"":90,""humor"":70,""professionalism"":60,""creativity"":85,""empathy"":75},""story_background"":""这是通过前端表单创建的角色背景"",""examples"":[{""input"":""你好，我是新角色！"",""output"":""你好！很高兴认识你，我是通过前端创建的新角色！""}],""personality_preset"":""friendly""}")

Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/ai/chat" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""character_id"":1,""session_id"":""75c8d41a-512f-4e30-9c61-046a92613c26"",""message"":""你好，哈利！很高兴见到你。""}")

Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/ai/chat" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""character_id"":1,""session_id"":""75c8d41a-512f-4e30-9c61-046a92613c26"",""message"":""你能告诉我魔法世界的秘密吗？""}")
Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/ai/emotion" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""message"":""我今天很开心，因为遇到了一个很棒的朋友！😊""}")

Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/ai/chat" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""character_id"":1,""session_id"":""75c8d41a-512f-4e30-9c61-046a92613c26"",""message"":""我今天心情不太好，能和我聊聊吗？""}")
Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/ai/tts" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""text"":""你好，我是哈利波特！"",""voice"":""zh-CN""}")
